thread.title: Nice and calm street
thread.title_full: Nice and calm street - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Cadet Lafayette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Marmar1986
title: Nice and calm street
text: We passed a weekend here, the street is nice and just 2-3 mins from metro and 5 mins from RER. We walked like 30 mins to reach Notre-Dame and saint Michael. The breakfast was OK, not many choices. The stuff are really nice and helpful, I arrived at 10 and they gave me the key of the room though the check-in was at 14. I had a very nice weekend there, will be back to this hotel.
